item.title: FAQ
item.description: Why? Being happy shouldn’t be that hard, Culpeo Labs is not about having the most amount of clients or the biggest contracts, but enjoying every project. We love what we do, we love Open Source and we love servers, that’s what we are. How are you better than “x”? Probably we are not, but we are different. We believe in failure and learning as much as possible from every little mistake.
